== Madalur (610350) ==

== Geographic Location and Population ==

Madalur is a village in the [[Sira ]] taluka of [[Tumkur]] district with an area of 2566.96 hectares and harbouring 1394 households with total population of 6518 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Sira]] is at a distance of 13 km. Male population is 3348 and female population is 3170. Scheduled Caste Population is 1951 and Scheduled Tribes population is 421. Census Location Code of the village is 610350<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.
